text: The Incredible Hulk is a 2008 action video game based on the Louis Leterrier movie of the same name. It was developed by Edge of Reality. It had Edward Norton, Liv Tyler, William Hurt and Tim Roth returning from their roles from the movies. ==Gameplay== The game has levels where the Hulk can destroy the environment and enemies such as the U-Foes. title: The Incredible Hulk (2008 video game)
